Title: ALTER DATABASE
Feature:
AlterDatabaseStmt ::=
    'ALTER' 'DATABASE' DBName? DatabaseOptionList

DatabaseOption ::=
    DefaultKwdOpt ( CharsetKw '='? CharsetName | 'COLLATE' '='? CollationName | 'ENCRYPTION' '='? EncryptionOpt )
Description: ALTER DATABASE 用于修改指定或当前数据库的默认字符集和排序规则。ALTER SCHEMA 跟 ALTER DATABASE 操作效果一样。
Examples: ALTER DATABASE test DEFAULT CHARACTER SET = utf8mb4;
Category: Schema 管理与数据定义语句 (DDL)
